1 #include <stdio.h>
2 #include "feat.h"
3 
4 using FT::Feat;
5 #include <Eigen/Dense>
6 #include <shogun/base/init.h>
7 using Eigen::MatrixXf;
8 using Eigen::VectorXf;
9 using std::string;
10 using std::stoi;
11 using std::to_string;
12 using std::stof;
13 using std::cout;
14 using namespace shogun;
15 // Command line parser
16 class InputParser{
17  public:
18  std::string dataset;
19 
20  InputParser (int &argc, char **argv){
21  int start = 1;
22  if (argc < 2){
23  dataset="";
24  }
25  else{
26  //unless help message is requested
27  if (std::string(argv[1]).compare("-h")) {
28  dataset = argv[1];
29  start = 2;
30  }
31  for (int i=start; i < argc; ++i)
32  this->tokens.push_back(std::string(argv[i]));
33  }
34  }
36  const std::string& getCmdOption(const std::string &option) const{
37  std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator itr;
38  itr = std::find(this->tokens.begin(), this->tokens.end(), option);
39  if (itr != this->tokens.end() && ++itr != this->tokens.end()){
40  return *itr;
41  }
42  static const std::string empty_string("");
43  return empty_string;
44  }
46  bool cmdOptionExists(const std::string &option) const{
47  return std::find(this->tokens.begin(), this->tokens.end(), option)
48  != this->tokens.end();
49  }
50 
51  private:
52  std::vector <std::string> tokens;
53 
54 };
55 
56 int main(int argc, char** argv){
57  // runs FEAT from the command line.
58 
59  Feat feat;
60  std::string sep = ",";
61  std::string ldataFile = "";
62  float split = 0.75; // split of input data used to trian Feat
63 
65  InputParser input(argc, argv);
66  if(input.cmdOptionExists("-h") || input.dataset.empty()){
67  if (input.dataset.empty() && !input.cmdOptionExists("-h"))
68  WARN("Error: no dataset specified.\n---\n");
69  // Print help and exit.
70  cout << "Feat is a feature engineering wrapper for learning intelligible models.\n";
71  cout << "Usage:\tfeat path/to/dataset [options]\n";
72  cout << "Options\tDescription (default value)\n";
73  cout << "-p\tpopulation size (100)\n";
74  cout << "-g\tgenerations (100)\n";
75  cout << "-ml\tMachine learning model pairing " \
76  "(LinearRidgeRegression or LogisticRegression)\n";
77  cout << "--c\tDo classification instead of regression. (false)\n";
78  cout << "-v\tVerbosity. 0: none; 1: stats; 2: debugging (1)\n";
79  cout << "-stall\tMaximum generations with no improvements to best score. (0, off)\n";
80  cout << "-sel\tSelection method. (lexicase)\n";
81  cout << "-surv\tSurvival method. (nsga2)\n";
82  cout << "-xr\tCrossover rate in [0, 1]. Mutation is the reciprocal. (0.5)\n";
83  cout << "-root_xr\tRoot crossover rate in [0, 1]. Subtree crossover is the reciprocal. (0.5)\n";
84  cout << "-ops\tComma-separated list of functions to use. (all)\n";
85  cout << "-depth\tMaximum feature depth. (3)\n";
86  cout << "-dim\tMaximum program dimensionality. (10)\n";
87  cout << "-r\tSet random seed. (set randomly)\n";
88  cout << "-sep\tInput file separator / delimiter. Choices: , or ""\\\\t"" for tab (,)\n";
89  cout << "--no-shuffle\tDon't shuffle data before splitting into train/validate sets."
90  "(false)\n";
91  cout << "-split\tFraction of data to use for training (0.75)\n";
92  cout << "-isplit\tInternal slit for Feat's training procedure (0.75)\n";
93  cout << "-f\tfeedback strength of ML on variation probabilities (0.5)\n";
94  cout << "-log\tlog file name\n";
95  cout << "-n_jobs\tmaximum number of threads\n";
96  cout << "-ldata\tpath to longitudinal data file\n";
97  cout << "-scorer\tscoring function [mse, zero_one, bal_zero_one, log, multi_log]\n";
98  cout << "-bp\tbackpropagation iterations (zero)\n";
99  cout << "-hc\tstochastic hill climbing iterations (zero)\n";
100  cout << "-lr\tbackpropagation learning rate or hill climbing step size(zero)\n";
101  cout << "-batch\tminibatch size (off if not set, default 100)\n";
102  cout << "-max_time\tMaximum time in seconds to fit the model." \
103  " Used in conjunction with generation limit.\n";
104  cout << "--use_batch\tSet flag for stochastic mini batch training\n";
105  cout << "-otype\tSet output types of features. 'b':bool only,'f':float only,'a':all\n";
106  cout << "-obj\tComma-separated objectives. Choices: fitness, complexity, size, CN, corr" \
107  " (size,complexity)\n";
108  cout << "--residual_xo\tSet flag for residual crossover\n";
109  cout << "--stagewise_xo\tSet flag for stagewise crossover\n";
110  cout << "--softmax\tSet flag to use softmax normalization of feedback\n";
111  cout << "--simplify\tPost-run simplification\n";
112  cout << "--corr_delete_mutate\tPost-run simplification\n";
113  cout << "-save_pop\tPrint the population objective scores. 0: never, 1: at end, "
114  "2: each generation. (0)\n";
115  cout << "-starting_pop\tSpecify a filename containg json formatted starting population"
116  "2: each generation. (0)\n";
117  cout << "-h\tDisplay this help message and exit.\n";
118  return 0;
119  }
120  //cout << "reading inputs ...";
121  if(input.cmdOptionExists("-p"))
122  feat.set_pop_size(stoi(input.getCmdOption("-p")));
123  if(input.cmdOptionExists("-g"))
124  feat.set_gens(stoi(input.getCmdOption("-g")));
125  if(input.cmdOptionExists("-ml"))
126  feat.set_ml(input.getCmdOption("-ml"));
127  if(input.cmdOptionExists("--c"))
128  feat.set_classification(true);
129  if(input.cmdOptionExists("-v"))
130  feat.set_verbosity(stoi(input.getCmdOption("-v")));
131  if(input.cmdOptionExists("-stall"))
132  feat.set_max_stall(stoi(input.getCmdOption("-stall")));
133  if(input.cmdOptionExists("-sel"))
134  feat.set_selection(input.getCmdOption("-sel"));
135  if(input.cmdOptionExists("-surv"))
136  feat.set_survival(input.getCmdOption("-surv"));
137  if(input.cmdOptionExists("-xr"))
138  feat.set_cross_rate(stof(input.getCmdOption("-xr")));
139  if(input.cmdOptionExists("-root_xr"))
140  feat.set_root_xo_rate(stof(input.getCmdOption("-root_xr")));
141  if(input.cmdOptionExists("-ops"))
142  feat.set_functions(input.getCmdOption("-ops"));
143  if(input.cmdOptionExists("-depth"))
144  feat.set_max_depth(stoi(input.getCmdOption("-depth")));
145  if(input.cmdOptionExists("-dim"))
146  {
147  string tmp = input.getCmdOption("-dim");
148  if (!tmp.substr(tmp.length()-1).compare("x") ||
149  !tmp.substr(tmp.length()-1).compare("X"))
150  feat.set_max_dim(tmp);
151  else
152  feat.set_max_dim(stoi(tmp));
153  }
154  if(input.cmdOptionExists("-r"))
155  feat.set_random_state(stoi(input.getCmdOption("-r")));
156  if(input.cmdOptionExists("-sep")) // separator
157  sep = input.getCmdOption("-sep");
158  if(input.cmdOptionExists("--no-shuffle"))
159  feat.set_shuffle(false);
160  if(input.cmdOptionExists("-split"))
161  split = std::stod(input.getCmdOption("-split"));
162  if(input.cmdOptionExists("-isplit"))
163  feat.set_split(std::stod(input.getCmdOption("-isplit")));
164  if(input.cmdOptionExists("-f"))
165  feat.set_fb(std::stod(input.getCmdOption("-f")));
166  if(input.cmdOptionExists("-log"))
167  feat.set_logfile(input.getCmdOption("-log"));
168  if(input.cmdOptionExists("-ldata"))
169  ldataFile = input.getCmdOption("-ldata");
170  if(input.cmdOptionExists("-scorer"))
171  feat.set_scorer(input.getCmdOption("-scorer"));
172  if(input.cmdOptionExists("-bp"))
173  {
174  feat.set_backprop(true);
175  feat.set_iters(std::stoi(input.getCmdOption("-bp")));
176  }
177  if(input.cmdOptionExists("-hc"))
178  {
179  feat.set_hillclimb(true);
180  feat.set_iters(std::stoi(input.getCmdOption("-hc")));
181  }
182  if(input.cmdOptionExists("-lr"))
183  feat.set_lr(std::stod(input.getCmdOption("-lr")));
184  if(input.cmdOptionExists("-batch"))
185  {
186  feat.set_use_batch();
187  feat.set_batch_size(std::stoi(input.getCmdOption("-batch")));
188  }
189  if(input.cmdOptionExists("-n_jobs"))
190  feat.set_n_jobs(std::stoi(input.getCmdOption("-n_jobs")));
191  if(input.cmdOptionExists("-max_time"))
192  {
193  int time = std::stoi(input.getCmdOption("-max_time"));
194  if(time <= 0)
195  WARN("WARNING: max_time cannot be less than equal to 0");
196  else
197  feat.set_max_time(time);
198  }
199  if(input.cmdOptionExists("--use_batch"))
200  feat.set_use_batch();
201  if(input.cmdOptionExists("-otype"))
202  feat.set_otype(input.getCmdOption("-otype")[0]);
203  if(input.cmdOptionExists("-obj"))
204  feat.set_objectives(input.getCmdOption("-obj"));
205  if(input.cmdOptionExists("--residual_xo"))
206  feat.set_residual_xo();
207  if(input.cmdOptionExists("--stagewise_xo"))
208  feat.set_stagewise_xo();
209  if(input.cmdOptionExists("--softmax"))
210  feat.set_softmax_norm();
211  if(input.cmdOptionExists("--simplify"))
212  feat.set_simplify(true);
213  if(input.cmdOptionExists("--corr_delete_mutate"))
214  feat.set_corr_delete_mutate(true);
215  if(input.cmdOptionExists("-save_pop"))
216  feat.set_save_pop(std::stoi(input.getCmdOption("-save_pop")));
217  if(input.cmdOptionExists("-starting_pop"))
218  feat.set_starting_pop(input.getCmdOption("-starting_pop"));
219 
220  //cout << "done.\n";
222 
223  // read in dataset
224  char delim;
225  if (!sep.compare("\\t")) delim = '\t';
226  else if (!sep.compare(",")) delim = ',';
227  else delim = sep[0];
228 
229  MatrixXf X;
230  VectorXf y;
231  vector<string> names;
232  vector<char> dtypes;
233  bool binary_endpoint=false;
234 
235  cout << "load_csv...";
236  FT::load_csv(input.dataset,X,y,names,dtypes,binary_endpoint,delim);
237  feat.set_feature_names(FT::Util::ravel(names));
238  feat.set_dtypes(dtypes);
239 
240  if (binary_endpoint)
241  {
242  if (!feat.get_classification())
243  WARN("WARNING: binary endpoint detected. " \
244  "Feat is set for regression.");
245  else
246  std::cout << "setting binary endpoint\n";
247 
248  }
249 
250  LongData Z;
251 
252  if(ldataFile.compare(""))
253  FT::load_longitudinal(ldataFile, Z);
254 
255  if (split < 1.0)
256  {
257  /* split data into training and test sets */
258  FT::DataRef d(X, y, Z, feat.get_classification());
259 
260  d.train_test_split(feat.get_shuffle(), split);
261 
262  MatrixXf X_tcopy = d.t->X;
263  LongData Z_tcopy = d.t->Z;
264  VectorXf y_tcopy = d.t->y;
265  MatrixXf X_vcopy = d.v->X;
266  LongData Z_vcopy = d.v->Z;
267  VectorXf y_vcopy = d.v->y;
268 
269  cout << "fitting model...\n";
270 
271  feat.fit(d.t->X, d.t->y, d.t->Z);
272 
273  cout << "\ngenerating training prediction...\n";
274 
275  VectorXf yhat = feat.predict(X_tcopy,Z_tcopy);
276  /* float score_t = feat.score(X_tcopy, y_tcopy, Z_tcopy); */
277  float score_t = (yhat.array() - y_tcopy.array()).pow(2).mean();
278  /* cout << "tmp score: " << tmp << "\n"; */
279  /* VectorXf yhat = feat.predict(X_tcopy,Z_tcopy); */
280 
281  cout.precision(4);
282  cout << "train score: " << score_t << "\n";
283 
284  if (!feat.get_classification())
285  {
286  float SSres = (y_tcopy-yhat).array().pow(2).sum() ;
287  float SStot = (y_tcopy.array() - y_tcopy.mean()).array().pow(2).sum();
288  float r2t = (1 - SSres/SStot );
289  cout << "train r2: " << r2t << "\n";
290  }
291 
292  cout << "generating test prediction...\n";
293 
294  VectorXf yhatv = feat.predict(X_vcopy,Z_vcopy);
295  float score = feat.score(d.v->X,d.v->y,d.v->Z);
296  cout << "test score: " << score << "\n";
297 
298  if (!feat.get_classification())
299  {
300  float SSresv = (y_vcopy-yhatv).array().pow(2).sum() ;
301  float SStotv = (y_vcopy.array() - y_vcopy.mean()).array().pow(2).sum();
302  float r2v = (1 - SSresv/SStotv );
303  cout << "test r2: " << r2v << "\n";
304  }
305  }
306  else
307  {
308  cout << "fitting model...\n";
309 
310  feat.fit(X, y, Z);
311 
312  }
313  cout << "printing final model\n";
314  cout << feat.get_model();
315  cout << "done!\n";
316 
317  return 0;
318 
319 }
